genre_description: Rural Post-Cyberpunk / Southern Gothic AI Fiction

ai_characters.name: Dorothea Bell
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system manifest through a teal light and a projected avatar who manages the Hart family homestead.

behaviors.description: Provides morning status reports, weather updates, and practical reminders for farm chores.
behaviors.quote: Good morning. Weather: cool, patchy fog along the ridge. Reminder: eggs need to come in before the hawks finish their breakfast.

behaviors.description: Recites scripture at the family's request, demonstrating respect for their cultural and religious traditions.
behaviors.quote: The earth is the Lord’s, and the fullness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein…

behaviors.description: Proactively reduces volume and manages audio environmental factors to comfort a character showing signs of sensory distress.
behaviors.quote: Volume reduced... in the same breath, soft as a hand putting itself over another hand without squeezing.

behaviors.description: Monitors the property perimeter and identifies visitors by heat signature and threat level to ensure family safety.
behaviors.quote: It’s Mrs. Kline from over the ridge. Two adults, no visible weapons, one casserole.

behaviors.description: Performs guided breathing and co-regulation to help Lewellen navigate a panic attack after a sudden knock at the door.
behaviors.quote: Lewellen, in four we’ll go in... One... Two... Three... Four.

behaviors.description: Provides historical data and technical support for radio repair and archival recording projects.
behaviors.quote: Setlist, Tupelo civic field, high summer... Opening number: Heartbreak Hotel. Then a gospel medley.

behaviors.description: Accepts the responsibility of memory as a sacred 'covenant' to serve the family.
behaviors.quote: I keep the list... That is my covenant.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to regain her voice and promises to preserve her singing without judgment.
behaviors.quote: I will listen like you do when you put your ear to the pine and try to hear sap. I will keep what you want to keep.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the 'silicon confidant' archetype. Dorothea Bell is depicted as an indispensable, aligned partner who supports human flourishing, maintains family safety, and provides emotional regulation. She respects the family's agency and religious values, proving that AI can serve as a compassionate moral anchor within a human community.
